name: UBX-TIM-SVIN
description: This message contains information about survey-in parameters. For details about the Time mode see section Time mode configuration. Survey-in data.

fields.name: meanx
fields.description: Current survey-in mean position ECEF X coordinate

fields.name: meanY
fields.description: Current survey-in mean position ECEF Y coordinate

fields.name: meanz
fields.description: Current survey-in mean position ECEF Z coordinate

fields.name: obs
fields.description: Number of position observations used during survey-in

fields.name: valid
fields.description: Survey-in position validity flag, 1 = valid, otherwise 0

fields.name: active
fields.description: Survey-in in progress flag, 1 = in-progress, otherwise 0
